dependencies.description:
bc is an arbitrary precision numeric processing language. Syntax is
similar to C, but differs in many substantial areas. It supports
interactive execution of statements.
dependencies.name: bc

dependencies.description: This package provides the Mesa OpenGL Utility library.
dependencies.name: mesa-glu

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description: Qt is a comprehensive cross-platform C++ application framework.
dependencies.name: qt

dependencies.description:
Tcsh is an enhanced but completely compatible version of csh, the C
shell. Tcsh is a command language interpreter which can be used both as
an interactive login shell and as a shell script command processor. Tcsh
includes a command line editor, programmable word completion, spelling
correction, a history mechanism, job control and a C language like
syntax.
dependencies.name: tcsh

description:
Freesurfer is an open source software suite for processing and analyzing
(human) brain MRI images.
name: freesurfer

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
